definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc

sentences.english: The low density areas occurred in the temporoparietal lobe near sylvian fissure in middle cerebral artery territory.
sentences.chinese: 大腦中動脈支配區外側裂附近顳頂葉梗塞。

sentences.english: Apraxias are generally associated with lesions of the dominant PARIETAL LOBE and supramarginal gyrus. (From Adams et al.
sentences.chinese: 失用症常由優勢半球頂葉和緣上回的損害有關。

sentences.english: The researchers observed enhanced activity in the intra-parietal sulcus, a part of the parietal cortex.
sentences.chinese: 研究者觀察到大腦皮層頂葉頂內溝活動增強。

sentences.english: Senator Kennedy’s tumor is in the left parietal lobe of the brain.
sentences.chinese: 參議員肯尼迪的腫瘤位於腦部左頂葉。
